page.title: 11LIFE STYLES AT STOKE ON TERN
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF STEVEN (11)} { } When I wake up in the morning I make my bed.My bed has got a quilt with a B.M.X. cover on it.I get up and get dressed at 7 o'clock,and have a wash and go down stairs and get my breakfast .I have cornflakes or wheatabix and a piece of toast with butter on it.After that I help my mum until it is time to go to school. I kiss my mum and go to school with Mr Stevens in the school taxi. I arrive at school at 8.40 am.I go down to the playground until 9.00 am. We go in and do some work until 10.40 am then we go outside to play. The whistle goes and we come in at 11 o'clock and do some work until 12 o'clock,then we have our dinner.We have school dinners or sandwiches from home.The school meals are nice because twice every week I have chips and fish or sausages
